headline: Belcan Establishes Aerospace & Defense Hub in Toulouse, France
summary: Belcan, LLC (a Cognizant company), a global supplier of design, software, manufacturing, supply chain, information technology, and digital engineering solutions to the aerospace, defense, space, automotive, industrial, marine, and government services markets, today announced the opening of its new office in Toulouse, France. thumbnail.caption: Belcan, a Cognizant company, is a global supplier of design, software, manufacturing, supply chain, information technology, and digital engineering solutions to the aerospace, defense, space, government services, automotive, and industrial markets.
